data.caption: VITON This animated clip demonstrates the transformation of the person in the [IMAGE] into the outfit described in the [CONDITION]; it begins with the [IMAGE]: A young woman smiles brightly with her body slightly turned, wearing a sleeveless two-tone long dress over black wide-leg pants, black sandals, and holding a silver shoulder bag. Then comes the [CONDITION]: A dark gray fitted short-sleeved top, white wide-leg trousers, black heeled sandals, a black shoulder bag, and a pendant necklace. [VIDEO]: She now wears the [CONDITION] outfit, standing confidently with a slight sway and cheerful expression.

VITON This animated clip demonstrates the transformation of the person in the [IMAGE] into the outfit described in the [CONDITION]; it begins with the [IMAGE]: A woman stands indoors in warm light, wearing a cream knit sweater, dark indigo jeans, black flip-flops, and holding both a black handbag and a paper bag. Then comes the [CONDITION]: A beige blazer over a printed white tee, gray sweatshirt tied at the waist, black slacks, black slip-on sneakers, and a large black tote. [VIDEO]: She now wears the [CONDITION] outfit, sipping coffee with her gaze turned to the side.

VITON This animated clip demonstrates the transformation of the person in the [IMAGE] into the outfit described in the [CONDITION]; it begins with the [IMAGE]: A woman stands on wooden flooring in soft light, wearing a cropped black sports jersey with white numbers, baggy light blue jeans, black-and-white sneakers, and smiling with a double thumbs-up. Then comes the [CONDITION]: A sleeveless yellow asymmetrical dress with a ruffled hem, cream pointed heels, and a brown mini handbag. [VIDEO]: She now wears the [CONDITION] outfit, walking gracefully with one arm slightly raised, holding the bag, exuding elegance in a bright room.

VITON This animated clip demonstrates the transformation of the person in the [IMAGE] into the outfit described in the [CONDITION]; it begins with the [IMAGE]: A woman stands by a large window in a high-rise room, wearing an off-shoulder pink knit sweater, loose white jeans, pink-and-white sneakers, and holding a burgundy tote bag. Then comes the [CONDITION]: A charcoal off-shoulder sweater with thumbhole sleeves, black flared shorts, glossy knee-high boots, and a large black shoulder bag. [VIDEO]: She now wears the [CONDITION] outfit, walking confidently with a composed look, highlighting the sleek, contrasting textures.

VITON This animated clip demonstrates the transformation of the person in the [IMAGE] into the outfit described in the [CONDITION]; it begins with the [IMAGE]: A woman stands in a cozy bedroom with soft lighting, wearing a split red-and-white comic crop top, blue cargo jeans with flap pockets, and black-and-white sneakers, smiling and waving. Then comes the [CONDITION]: A cropped black graphic tee, low-rise moto-style wide-leg jeans with ribbed panels, black platform shoes, and layered silver jewelry. [VIDEO]: She now wears the [CONDITION] outfit, posing confidently with one hand on her waist as her necklace catches the light.

VITON This animated clip demonstrates the transformation of the person in the [IMAGE] into the outfit described in the [CONDITION]; it begins with the [IMAGE]: A woman stands in a warmly lit living room, wearing a pink oversized T-shirt, soft pajama pants with blue patterns, and red character slippers, hands in her pockets and hair relaxed. Then comes the [CONDITION]: A light blue striped fitted blouse, charcoal pleated mini skirt, white loose socks, and chunky black platforms. [VIDEO]: She now wears the [CONDITION] outfit, swaying gently with a relaxed smile, brushing her hair back with a youthful charm.
